venue: Sunnyvale Community Center, 550 E. Remington Drive, Sunnyvale, CA 94087
steps: Arrive at the Sunnyvale Community Center by 10:00 AM.
Children gather in the storytelling circle.
A warm-up activity to get acquainted with the theme of the story.
Interactive storytelling session begins, with pauses for group interaction.
Encourage children to share their thoughts and feelings during the story.
Conclude with a short relaxation exercise.
safety: Ensure children have name tags and caregivers are present.
